title: Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru Special

synonyms: Otome wa Onee-sama ni Koi Shiteru
The Maiden Is Falling In Love With The Elder Sister
Otome wa Boku ni Koi Shiteru: Ookina Shounen Shoujo no Sekai Meisaku no Mori - Tsunderella
alternative_titles.en: Otoboku: Maidens are Falling for Me! Special
alternative_titles.ja: 乙女はお姉さま[ボク]に恋してる 大きな少年少女の世界名作の森 ~ツンデレラ~

synopsis: Special DVD episode combining the storyline of Cinderella and Snow White (chibi style) with the "Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru" cast.
